XData.Data: <process language='objectscript' request='Demo.Msg.AudioRequest' response='Demo.Msg.AudioResponse' height='2000' width='2000' > <context> <property name='audioRequest' type='St.OpenAi.Msg.Audio.AudioRequest' instantiate='0' /> <property name='audioResponse' type='St.OpenAi.Msg.Audio.AudioRequest' instantiate='0' /> </context> <sequence xend='200' yend='650' > <transform name='Audio to OpenAi audio' class='Demo.DT.AudioToOpenAiAudio' source='request' target='context.audioRequest' xpos='200' ypos='250' /> <call name='Call API' target='St.OpenAi.BO.Api.Connect' async='1' xpos='200' ypos='350' > <request type='St.OpenAi.Msg.Audio.AudioRequest' > <assign property="callrequest" value="context.audioRequest" action="set" /> </request> <response type='St.OpenAi.Msg.Audio.AudioResponse' > <assign property="context.audioResponse" value="callresponse" action="set" /> </response> </call> <sync name='Wait Call APi' calls='Call API' type='all' xpos='200' ypos='450' /> <transform name='OpenAi audio to Audio' class='Demo.DT.OpenAiIAudioToAudio' source='context.audioResponse' target='response' xpos='200' ypos='550' /> </sequence> </process>

XData.Data: <process language='objectscript' request='Demo.Msg.ImageRequest' response='Demo.Msg.ImageResponse' includes='St.OpenAi.OpenAi' height='2000' width='2000' > <context> <property name='imagesRequest' type='St.OpenAi.Msg.Images.ImagesRequest' instantiate='0' /> <property name='imagesResponse' type='St.OpenAi.Msg.Images.ImagesResponse' instantiate='0' /> </context> <sequence xend='200' yend='650' > <transform name='Image to OpenAi image' class='Demo.DT.ImageToOpenAiImage' source='request' target='context.imagesRequest' xpos='200' ypos='250' /> <call name='Call Api' target='St.OpenAi.BO.Api.Connect' async='1' xpos='200' ypos='350' > <request type='St.OpenAi.Msg.Images.ImagesRequest' > <assign property="callrequest" value="context.imagesRequest" action="set" /> </request> <response type='St.OpenAi.Msg.Images.ImagesResponse' > <assign property="context.imagesResponse" value="callresponse" action="set" /> </response> </call> <sync name='Wait Call APi' calls='Call Api' type='all' xpos='200' ypos='450' /> <transform name='OpenAi image to Image' class='Demo.DT.OpenAiImageToImage' source='context.imagesResponse' target='response' xpos='200' ypos='550' /> </sequence> </process>

XData.Data: <process language='objectscript' request='Ens.Request' response='Ens.Response' includes='St.OpenAi.OpenAi' height='2000' width='2420' > <sequence xend='200' yend='700' > <switch name='CheckRequest' xpos='200' ypos='250' xend='200' yend='500' > <case condition='$classname(request)="Demo.Msg.ImageRequest"' name='Demo.Msg.ImageImageRequest' > <call name='Create new image' target='Demo.BP.Image' async='1' xpos='200' ypos='400' > <request type='Demo.Msg.ImageRequest' > <assign property="callrequest" value="request" action="set" languageOverride="" /> </request> <response type='Demo.Msg.ImageResponse' > <assign property="response" value="callresponse" action="set" languageOverride="" /> </response> </call> </case> <case condition='$classname(request)="St.OpenAi.Msg.Model.ModelRequest"' name='St.OpenAi.Msg.Model.ModelRequest' > <call name='Retrieve models' target='St.OpenAi.BO.Api.Connect' async='1' xpos='470' ypos='400' > <request type='St.OpenAi.Msg.Model.ModelRequest' > <assign property="callrequest" value="request" action="set" languageOverride="" /> </request> <response type='St.OpenAi.Msg.Model.ModelResponse' > <assign property="response" value="callresponse" action="set" languageOverride="" /> </response> </call> </case> <case condition='$classname(request)="Demo.Msg.ChatRequest"' name='Demo.Msg.ChatRequest' > <call name='Create a chat' target='Demo.BP.Chat' async='1' xpos='740' ypos='400' > <request type='Demo.Msg.ChatRequest' > <assign property="callrequest" value="request" action="set" languageOverride="" /> </request> <response type='Demo.Msg.ChatResponse' > <assign property="response" value="callresponse" action="set" languageOverride="" /> </response> </call> </case> <case condition='$classname(request)="St.OpenAi.Msg.Model.ListModelRequest"' name='St.OpenAi.Msg.Model.ListModelRequest' > <call name='Retrieve all models' target='St.OpenAi.BO.Api.Connect' async='1' xpos='1010' ypos='400' > <request type='St.OpenAi.Msg.Model.ListModelRequest' > <assign property="callrequest" value="request" action="set" languageOverride="" /> </request> <response type='St.OpenAi.Msg.Model.ListModelResponse' > <assign property="response" value="callresponse" action="set" languageOverride="" /> </response> </call> </case> <case condition='$classname(request)="Demo.Msg.AudioRequest"' name='Demo.Msg.AudioRequest' > <call name='Audio managment' target='Demo.BP.Audio' async='1' xpos='1280' ypos='400' > <request type='Demo.Msg.AudioRequest' > <assign property="callrequest" value="request" action="set" languageOverride="" /> </request> <response type='Demo.Msg.AudioResponse' > <assign property="response" value="callresponse" action="set" languageOverride="" /> </response> </call> </case> <case condition='$classname(request)="Demo.Msg.SpeachRequest"' name='Demo.Msg.SpeachRequest' > <call name='Audio Speach' target='Demo.BP.Speach' async='1' xpos='1550' ypos='400' > <request type='Demo.Msg.SpeachRequest' > <assign property="callrequest" value="request" action="set" languageOverride="" /> </request> <response type='Demo.Msg.SpeachResponse' > <assign property="response" value="callresponse" action="set" languageOverride="" /> </response> </call> </case> <default> <empty name='Do nothing' xpos='1820' ypos='400' /> </default> </switch> <sync name='Wait calls' calls='Create new image,Retrieve models,Create a chat,Retrieve all models,Audio managment,Audio Speach' type='all' xpos='200' ypos='600' /> </sequence> </process>

XData.name: UrlMap
XData.Data: <Routes> <Route Url="(?i)/image/create" Method="POST" Call="CreateImage"/> <Route Url="(?i)/image/edit" Method="POST" Call="EditImage"/> <Route Url="(?i)/image/variation" Method="POST" Call="VariationImage"/> <Route Url="(?i)/audio/transcription" Method="POST" Call="TranscriptionAudio"/> <Route Url="(?i)/audio/speach" Method="POST" Call="SpeachAudio"/> <Route Url="(?i)/audio/translation" Method="POST" Call="TranslationAudio"/> <Route Url="(?i)/models/:modelname" Method="GET" Call="Models"/> <Route Url="(?i)/models" Method="GET" Call="AllModels"/> <Route Url="(?i)/chat" Method="POST" Call="Chat"/> </Routes>

Method.name: RetrieveImage
Method.Implementation:
set %response.ContentType = "application/json; charset=utf-8" set $ZSTORAGE=-1
do ##class(Ens.Director).CreateBusinessService(..#CLASSBS, .service)
Try { $$$TRACE("Init process") set dynamic = ##class(%Library.DynamicObject).%FromJSON(%request.Content) set pRequest = ##class(Demo.Msg.ImageRequest).%New() do pRequest.%JSONImport(dynamic) $$$TRACE("Dynamic created") set pRequest.Operation = operation $$$TRACE("Calling OpenAi") set tSC = service.SendRequestSync(..#BPOPENAI, pRequest, .pResponse) $$$ThrowOnError(tSC) $$$TRACE("Init process") set %response.Status= ..#HTTP200OK set %response.CharSet = "utf-8" set %response.ContentType = "application/json" do pResponse.%JSONExportToStream(.tStream) do tStream.OutputToDevice() } Catch ex { Set tSC=ex.AsStatus() set errorCode = $system.Status.GetErrorCodes(tSC) Set msgError = $System.Status.GetOneStatusText(tSC,1) set pError = ##class(%Library.DynamicObject).%New() set %response.Status= ..#HTTP200OK set %response.CharSet = "utf-8" set %response.ContentType = "application/json" set pError.code = errorCode Set pError.message = msgError write pError.%ToJSON() }
quit $$$OK

Method.name: Audio
Method.Implementation:
set %response.ContentType = "application/json; charset=utf-8" set $ZSTORAGE=-1
do ##class(Ens.Director).CreateBusinessService(..#CLASSBS, .service)
Try { $$$TRACE("Init process") set dynamic = ##class(%Library.DynamicObject).%FromJSON(%request.Content) set pRequest = ##class(Demo.Msg.AudioRequest).%New() do pRequest.%JSONImport(dynamic) $$$TRACE("Dynamic created") set pRequest.Operation = operation $$$TRACE("Calling OpenAi") set tSC = service.SendRequestSync(..#BPOPENAI, pRequest, .pResponse) $$$ThrowOnError(tSC) $$$TRACE("Init process") set %response.Status= ..#HTTP200OK set %response.CharSet = "utf-8" set %response.ContentType = "application/json" set tStream = ##class(%Stream.FileCharacter).%New() do pResponse.%JSONExportToStream(.tStream) Do tStream.TranslateTableSet("UTF8") Set tStream.BOM=$C(239,187,191) do tStream.OutputToDevice() } Catch ex { Set tSC=ex.AsStatus() set errorCode = $system.Status.GetErrorCodes(tSC) Set msgError = $System.Status.GetOneStatusText(tSC,1) set pError = ##class(%Library.DynamicObject).%New() set %response.Status= ..#HTTP200OK set %response.CharSet = "utf-8" set %response.ContentType = "application/json" set pError.code = errorCode Set pError.message = msgError write pError.%ToJSON() }
quit $$$OK

Method.name: SpeachAudio
Models
Method.Implementation:
set %response.ContentType = "application/json; charset=utf-8" set $ZSTORAGE=-1
do ##class(Ens.Director).CreateBusinessService(..#CLASSBS, .service)
Try { $$$TRACE("Init process") set pRequest = ##class(St.OpenAi.Msg.Model.ModelRequest).%New() set pRequest.Model = modelName $$$TRACE("Calling OpenAi") set tSC = service.SendRequestSync(..#BPOPENAI, pRequest, .pResponse) $$$ThrowOnError(tSC) $$$TRACE("Init process") set %response.Status= ..#HTTP200OK set %response.CharSet = "utf-8" set %response.ContentType = "application/json" do pResponse.%JSONExportToStream(.tStream) do tStream.OutputToDevice() } Catch ex { Set tSC=ex.AsStatus() set errorCode = $system.Status.GetErrorCodes(tSC) Set msgError = $System.Status.GetOneStatusText(tSC,1) set pError = ##class(%Library.DynamicObject).%New() set %response.Status= ..#HTTP200OK set %response.CharSet = "utf-8" set %response.ContentType = "application/json" set pError.code = errorCode Set pError.message = msgError write pError.%ToJSON() }
quit $$$OK

Method.name: AllModels
Method.Implementation:
set %response.ContentType = "application/json; charset=utf-8" set $ZSTORAGE=-1
do ##class(Ens.Director).CreateBusinessService(..#CLASSBS, .service)
Try { $$$TRACE("Init process") set pRequest = ##class(St.OpenAi.Msg.Model.ListModelRequest).%New() $$$TRACE("Calling OpenAi") set tSC = service.SendRequestSync(..#BPOPENAI, pRequest, .pResponse) $$$ThrowOnError(tSC) $$$TRACE("Init process") set %response.Status= ..#HTTP200OK set %response.CharSet = "utf-8" set %response.ContentType = "application/json" do pResponse.%JSONExportToStream(.tStream) do tStream.OutputToDevice() } Catch ex { Set tSC=ex.AsStatus() set errorCode = $system.Status.GetErrorCodes(tSC) Set msgError = $System.Status.GetOneStatusText(tSC,1) set pError = ##class(%Library.DynamicObject).%New() set %response.Status= ..#HTTP200OK set %response.CharSet = "utf-8" set %response.ContentType = "application/json" set pError.code = errorCode Set pError.message = msgError write pError.%ToJSON() }
quit $$$OK

Method.name: Chat
Method.Implementation:
set %response.ContentType = "application/json; charset=utf-8" set $ZSTORAGE=-1
do ##class(Ens.Director).CreateBusinessService(..#CLASSBS, .service)
Try { $$$TRACE("Init process") set dynamic = ##class(%Library.DynamicObject).%FromJSON(%request.Content) set pRequest = ##class(Demo.Msg.ChatRequest).%New() do pRequest.%JSONImport(dynamic) $$$TRACE("Dynamic created") $$$TRACE("Calling OpenAi") set tSC = service.SendRequestSync(..#BPOPENAI, pRequest, .pResponse) $$$ThrowOnError(tSC) $$$TRACE("Init process") set %response.Status= ..#HTTP200OK set %response.CharSet = "utf-8" set %response.ContentType = "application/json" set tStream = ##class(%Stream.FileCharacter).%New() do pResponse.%JSONExportToStream(.tStream) Do tStream.TranslateTableSet("UTF8") Set tStream.BOM=$C(239,187,191) do tStream.OutputToDevice() } Catch ex { Set tSC=ex.AsStatus() set errorCode = $system.Status.GetErrorCodes(tSC) Set msgError = $System.Status.GetOneStatusText(tSC,1) set pError = ##class(%Library.DynamicObject).%New() set %response.Status= ..#HTTP200OK set %response.CharSet = "utf-8" set %response.ContentType = "application/json" set pError.code = errorCode Set pError.message = msgError write pError.%ToJSON() }
quit $$$OK

Method.name: OnProcessInput

XData.name: DTL
XData.Data: <transform sourceClass='Demo.Msg.AudioRequest' targetClass='St.OpenAi.Msg.Audio.AudioRequest' create='new' language='objectscript' > <assign value='source.Audio' property='target.Audio' action='set' /> <assign value='source.Type' property='target.Type' action='set' /> <assign value='source.Language' property='target.Language' action='set' /> <assign value='$CASE(source.Operation,"TRANSCRIPTION":"transcription", "TRANSLATION":"translation",:"transcription") ' property='target.Operation' action='set' /> <if condition='source.FullInfo' > <true> <assign value='"verbose_json"' property='target.ResponseFormat' action='set' /> </true> <false> <assign value='"json"' property='target.ResponseFormat' action='set' /> </false> </if> </transform>

XData.name: DTL
XData.Data: <transform sourceClass='Demo.Msg.ImageRequest' targetClass='St.OpenAi.Msg.Images.ImagesRequest' create='new' language='objectscript' > <assign value='source.Prompt' property='target.Prompt' action='set' /> <assign value='source.NumImage' property='target.NumOfImages' action='set' /> <assign value='$CASE(source.Size,"S":"256x256","M":"512x512","L":"1024x1024",:"1024x1024")' property='target.Size' action='set' /> <assign value='$CASE(source.Base64,1:"b64_json",:"url")' property='target.ResponseFormat' action='set' /> <assign value='$CASE(source.Operation,"CREATE":"generations", "EDIT":"edits", "VARIATION":"variations",:"generations") ' property='target.Operation' action='set' /> <assign value='source.Image' property='target.Image' action='set' /> <assign value='source.Mask' property='target.Mask' action='set' /> </transform>

XData.name: DTL
XData.Data: <transform sourceClass='St.OpenAi.Msg.Audio.AudioResponse' targetClass='Demo.Msg.AudioResponse' create='new' language='objectscript' > <assign value='source.Task' property='target.Task' action='set' /> <assign value='source.Language' property='target.Language' action='set' /> <assign value='source.Duration' property='target.Duration' action='set' /> <assign value='source.Text' property='target.Text' action='set' /> </transform>

XData.name: DTL
XData.Data: <transform sourceClass='St.OpenAi.Msg.Images.ImagesResponse' targetClass='Demo.Msg.ImageResponse' create='new' language='objectscript' > <foreach property='source.Data()' key='k1' > <if condition='source.Data.(k1).Url = ""' > <true> <assign value='source.Data.(k1).Base64' property='target.Data.(k1)' action='set' /> </true> <false> <assign value='source.Data.(k1).Url' property='target.Data.(k1)' action='set' /> </false> </if> </foreach> </transform>

XData.name: DTL
XData.Data: <transform sourceClass='St.OpenAi.Msg.Audio.SpeachResponse' targetClass='Demo.Msg.SpeachResponse' create='new' language='objectscript' > <assign value='source.Content' property='target.Data' action='set' /> <assign value='source.ResponseFormat' property='target.ResponseFormat' action='set' /> </transform>

XData.name: DTL
XData.Data: <transform sourceClass='Demo.Msg.SpeachRequest' targetClass='St.OpenAi.Msg.Audio.SpeachRequest' create='new' language='objectscript' > <assign value='source.Model' property='target.Model' action='set' /> <assign value='source.Prompt' property='target.Prompt' action='set' /> <assign value='source.Voice' property='target.Voice' action='set' /> </transform>

Property.name: Audio
Property.Description: Base64 of the audio to transcript/translate

Property.name: Type
Property.Description: Type of file. (flac, mp3, mp4, mpeg, mpga, m4a, ogg, wav, or webm.)

Property.name: FullInfo
Property.Description: Retrieve all the info about the audio or only the text

Property.name: Prompt
Property.Description: Prompt of the images to create

Property.name: Size
Property.Description: Size of the image, S-Small, M-Medium, L-Large

Property.name: Base64
Property.Description: Retrieve the images in Base64, by default will be retrieved in url

Property.name: Image
Property.Description: The image to edit. Must be a valid PNG file, less than 4MB, and square. If mask is not provided, image must have transparency, which will be used as the mask.

Property.name: Mask
Property.Description: An additional image whose fully transparent areas (e.g. where alpha is zero) indicate where image should be edited. Must be a valid PNG file, less than 4MB, and have the same dimensions as image

Property.name: Model
Property.Description: The model to use for this request

Property.name: Prompt
Property.Description: The text to generate audio for. The maximum length is 4096 characters.

Property.name: Voice
Property.Description: The voice to use when generating the audio. Supported voices are alloy, echo, fable, onyx, nova, and shimmer
